p: In summary, future scenarios show a loss of suitable areas for the persistence of the species in relation to CPH in the M region (RCP 4.5 46% and RCP 8.5 59%). There is also a prominent shift of suitable areas to the south of the M region (Figs 3 and 4). In contrast, there is a massive increment of suitable areas towards deeper waters (50â€“75 m) (1023% in RCP 4.5 and 1229% in RCP 8.5), mainly in the southern portion of its distribution, at the Abrolhos Bank (off Espirito Santo State) ( Table 3).
